bow: how often do you get pictures done of your kids family feeling like slacker mom full disclosure because have never been in reddit before do have business but not here to market it do have wide circle of mom friends locally that can ask this sort of question have only been mom for two years and my husband suggested check out reddit how often do you realistically want to get pictures of your kids see lot of mini sessions springing up all year around valentine day easter mother day first day of school halloween and christmas what is actually realistic are all these sessions that kind of pinterest mom kinds of pressure my personal inclination is to say like maybe per year but want to provide what people are interested in my inclination toward maybe per year makes me concerned about over doing sessions if plan for more do want people to feel like expect them to book sessions every two months all year round and that how would feel would rather people invest in the pictures they really want to have and for me personally that has never been mini sessions if you ca tell am horrible sales person do like to tell people they need to spend money on things that do truly believe they need to have quality pictures are always worth the investment but think it is worth investing in the things that are most important to you and for me that is birthdays family time and traditions big events notsomuch the themed shoots discuss please am truly trying to understand how to better conduct business that meets client needs and expectations not just mine your pictures are about you not me and if want to call myself professional feel it is my responsibility to use my vision and skills to make my client expectations come to reality not to tell people what they want be happy with my work and them not get what they want do want to just do what everyone else is doing because it is what is the norm but ca just only offer the things like because my taste is my own if this post is allowed apologies in advance reading the rules it did seem like it is allowed we do professional photos once per year we do at least once year and sometimes twice with the second round including other family members like our siblings parents do freelance portrait photography and never approach people directly about hiring me unless it comes up in casual conversation ie someone saying really need to get pictures of my kid done and ll say hey photographer if you need some and then move on and do bring it up again until they approach me specifically to book as for like social media advertising of the mini sessions do 30 minute mini sessions all year long but dont see anything wrong with making general post about special holiday props pricing and what have you each season but would approach your friends about it personally expecting them to hire you fb local garage sale groups are great for that though ll be honest never well not yet at least mostly because we knew our family was complete yet want to do family photos annually after arrives because we know it our last and it seems to make sense to me that way my local photographer in town does mini sessions and family sessions for reasonable price so we ll be going with her it ridiculously expensive in the city though some sales advice for you it not your job to figure out what general client needs are beyond the basic people want good quality pictures in reasonable amount of time you re the expert photographer you know all the advantages of having good pictures and it your business to run in way that feels right it your job to present all the advantages of getting pictures done with you because your client may not be seeing your perspective and if you do give it who will you re not saying you want this you re saying these are all the great things about getting this at this price it up to the client to decide how to spend their money when faced with specific client yes you take the time to get to know them enough to give more targeted recommendations but do ever apologize for what you sell it has value you see it or you would do it show the client why you do what you do and then it in their hands if you ve convinced them of the value and deliver accurately they will always be happy we just did our first set little dude is 21 months old we ve never been to pro photo shoot but we ve ended up with pro photos through various channels weddings we re all dressed up the photographer takes photos of everyone and our friends are nice enough to give us the jpeg of our family for free from their hugely expensive wedding package thank you school photos we have several pro photos of our little one just not with us in them student photographers occasionally we run into someone at party or other event who photography student and wants to go into portrait photography so they ask if they can take photos of us there and then sure they send us the files we give feedback freebie time again hate the idea of photo sessions so do think we ll ever do professional studio portraits our personal cameras are good enough and our photo skills are good enough for our liking also prefer to photograph my child as she goes about her daily life and not for set event like easter or christmas it nice to take photos on those days but just watching her at play is the best thing for me personally for me into photos once or twice year have baby who just turned one so do have much experience however my coworker friend that recommended the photographer that we used for my baby 1st birthday photos offers the same kinds of stuff you re talking about christmas easter fall amp halloween etc my friend does some of those do think she feels pressured because do think the photographer personally and directly offers these services to clients and then waits for response that would be super awkward if you re on her mailing list you get little mail about these events do think my friend does all of them but if one is being offered around the time of year that she wants photos anyway then she ll go for it think if you are going to be professional photographer it smart to offer these things because people like variety and like things to be special so if someone is getting photos taken because of special event birthday first communion kid lost their first tooth whatever it would be nice to be able to get photos that also correspond with the season so that the photos they get over the years do look like the same damn thing over and over just that the kids are older also why would you just offer two christian family might really be into christmas and easter photos while other families might be into 4th of july and fall photos people want to be able to have variety to choose from and quite frankly if had two photographers of equal talent to choose from and one only offered special session types per year and the other offered many different kinds probably go with the one that has more offerings especially since those particular might not interest me also think about your own schedule let say you become popular photographer you re doing themed sessions per year so the families you serve that want themed photos all have to pack into your schedule during those timeframes you re going to be overloaded you wo be able to fit everyone in and because your workload is going to be nuts during those times you ll be late getting finished products into people hands etc offering them does mean people will feel pressured to book mean it not like as someone is leaving session you need to shove flier in their hands for the next one you re doing and ask if they want to book the next session before they leave it like when carter is having sale get the flier in the mail and if need something ll stop in but getting the flier does make me feel weird think you re overthinking this still have done any professional photographs and my oldest is years want to though it on the list do think there anything wrong with offering lots of mini sessions you are saying you should do 12 photo shoots year you re saying if easter is holiday you really like here photo session for it if were better adult probably do one family session year and another one just for the kids maybe right around when school starts deleted deleted deleted deleted deleted just fyi none of the responses you ve made have actually been as response to the post you were replying to when you want to respond to something someone has posted click the reply link directly below what they wrote and little box will pop up for you to type into oh holy crap haha noob thanks do reddit do overthink lot said two thinking more of like seasonal rather than themed sessions hate props and do have studio mini sessions are good for meeting lot of people in short amount of time which is why lot of people do them but ca imagine doing them every couple of months all year around it lot and it just feels supers salesy to me like the photographer just wants to keep making money off of people any way they can is it particular time of year like fall yeah get that do really approach people either do work out of studio though and do really work with props and sets prefer lifestyle documentary approach to sessions that why trying to get handle on what most people actually want the last thing want to do is invest in bunch of props and sets that do really like working with and then find that most people prefer formal session to themed mini thank you still working on that delivery haha as said terrible salesperson and still trying to get feel for how want my presence with clients to be tend to overthink more experience will certainly help that is unfortunately why exploring all of this have had enough in the door to get into good rhythm yet my local market is odd one and do like how most choose to operate within it that what like too that how tend to shoot families when get the chance to but most people figure they can just do it themselves and wo pay for professional pictures that are that normal look at everyday life studios are way stiff for me natural is the way to go think it depends on what you charge the photographer use is way cheap seriously she excellent and she charges 35 for mini session where she brings all the props etc and we get 20 edited photos 50 for an hour session with 35 edited photos she does mini sessions for spring summer fall and christmas we hit up some of the mini sessions and then paid the 50 charge for pictures of my twins first birthday now do feel obligated to do every mini session she has she ll throw in back to school theme or beach theme and we do go to those but if it weekend that we have open it so easy for us to wrangle three kids together for 30 minute session and at the end of the day the price is right so if the kids do cooperate and get good photos instead of 20 not that fussed my suggestion would be to advertise on facebook as much as you want if you re feeling the weather one day and you want to say hey found this great field of daisies book your session for tomorrow that great idea it gets people to know you gets them to think about and associate you with photo sessions and there no pressure or hard sell aspect to mini session you may also want to try give away for every person who likes your page they get ticket in raffle for free or half price mini session or something of that nature long post short do as many sessions as you want people will book only the ones they want to book and they wont feel obligated to attend more than they want my son is two and we have yet to do professional photo session even though really really want to we had one done in the hospital room when he was born but that it we ve done our own little set up for christmas but they never turn out like want them to would probably only do one year either do one for fall or christmas but not both in one year since sahm could never afford the outrageous price see people pay on facebook and my husband does see the point in them at all so usually set my son down next to pumpkin display at festival and snap picture with my phone think lot of families only do it once year and mostly in the fall prepping for holiday cards just had some done with my favorite photographer we use him once every two years and he said there is family he shoots times year and he is cheap so think the very unhelpful but accurate answer is it is different for every family try to do family one once per year my son will get at least one around christmas halloween and other days we do pay for them as grandma is photographer she takes photos all year good ones once year our photog is also very affordable in our baby first year had lots of pics done really loved that first year of growth we did newborn baptism easter random sporty summer month old one fall family outside shoot and christmas family inside in following years we ve done only easter and christmas family we do birthday family session in july shamelessly model after other businesses you respect be detailed and firm in all your policies set it up the way you want to and either you ll attract the clients who also do like the prevailing model or you ll start seeing why it run that way and can shift accordingly that the wonderful thing about your own small business if you decide it should be different down the road change it just commit to whatever you think the best version is now once year for christmas cards literally never once every other year or so if that the idea of taking multiple photo shoots through the single year seems extremely excessive it took me so long to find this comment was starting to think was the only one nope you re not alone not fan of professional photos take tons of candid photos of the kiddos doing fun stuff smiling playing etc those are the photos love but spending 200 to see us standing around wearing clothes we hate and forced smiles no thanks lol have yet do really tend to of course she is only three months now if we were getting whole ton of extended family together maybe but no you are no alone honestly never think posed family pictures look ridiculous if never see another oversaturated family in jeans and shirts in front of barn door or vintage truck it ll be fine with me have about 10 000 000 pictures of my family and when see particularly nice one print it as an 8x10 and put it in frame occasionally ll photoshop it bit first never get them done my mom got suckered in by some mall photo kiosk so have like professional photos that cost ridiculous amount of money they re cute but not worth it get photos from school when it comes around but they always suck luckily my husband is very good at photography and do suck too much either so we have lot of good free photos but the whole posing and formal thing nope what might get me in is quality do come up to me saying some bullshit like you re kid could be model let make portfolio yeah they did that get away from me with that nonsense think lot of it depends on how you market yourself and what kind of clients you end up having if you want to take props minis types of themed shoots you ll end up with clients who want those if you do the other kinds it ll be that kind of client but think bottom line is that everyone struggles with how to grow their business in non pushy way exactly feel the same way rather have action shots or photos ve taken at home in our normal life then posed ones that do come with any memories when see those annual photos from school that everyone had taken as kid literally all they show me is what looked like all of our family photos show so much more yep samesies my husband has good eye and few good cameras we re good but totally seem to be the outlier among my friends with kids so do do them why do something you hate you can offer that you do all sorts of holidays or themes but no mom is alike for me never got photos done except when my son was 6m old his grandma insisted he needed to be in picture with santa and promised to pay for it then after we got the pictures said she needed to pay for her brothers daughters picture portion and that we needed to pitch in for theirs and ours also was 18 he 52 and she 54 should they have dependable finances and not exploit me for money however if had more disposable income definitely get photos done with whatever whim with babies 6m 12m 18m yrs it should be every months because the growth they make is quite dramatic but after it should focus more on themes relating to holidays and the child interests professionally never sorry hun same here thankfully instagram effects hide the flaws of my amateur iphone photograpy this means you have not been with good photographer lifestyle photographer and just come and capture your special moments detest posing people it not fun ll do it if they want but my best images are the ones that capture while you forget there have tons of images of my kids and my husband and kids but being the one always behind the camera there are never any of me we are investing in really great photog when we go to hawaii to capture all of us so my kids can know that they did grow up motherless *edit typo removed we do christmas and birthday luckily his birthday is in spring so we do easter family birthday all in one shoot love our photographer but they are soooo pricey actually shopping around for new photographer so can do more throughout the year was thinking of trying facebook mini session but the ones have seem do seem as nice as my photographer we do late fall family photos and then yearly portrait on our daughter birthday photos are huge in my family and as awesome as my camera is and the number of candid photos we take are wonderful we rarely get photos of all of us together as family usually one parent and our daughter so family photos are big deal for us we are getting our family pictures done on saturday for the first time since last october would *love* to get them done more often but everywhere around here is just so dang expensive that ca justify it if going to spend good chunk of money feel like there are things that it would be better spent on however when see mini sessions pop up around the holidays or throughout the year much more inclined to do one of those than am to splurge on family session ll probably stick to once year for those especially once my kids get older but if the mini sessions are offered at reasonable price would take up the offer sucker for cute pictures of my kids especially if they can be used as gift around father day easter birthdays etc not prop person either do all my mini sessions in local state park and that gets pretty good traction still the only place advertise when doing whole day with staggered booking times for reduced rate is the local city fb garage sale site and they fill up pretty quickly generally do two days in spring or early summer and two days in fall when the leaves are changing where am but my photography is supplemental income to my other freelancing so only allot weekends to it and thus take on lot less booking it all about what fits your life the one thing always promised myself was professional photo of my baby every month for his first year if did nothing else wanted that for myself on his birthday will have his one year photos taken with his father and and our two dogs later we will have his smash cake photos after that it will be yearly but will forever have photos of my boy for every month in his first year and am thankful for that as he has grown so much and already feel like ve missed it all but have my photos and happy for it this was my gift to myself will do the same for any other children we have and fortunately it will be easy as the photographer found is now our family photographer going to go look back now and cry little bit about how much my boy has grown in just year 😭😭😭 my kid is and have never had professional photograph taken of him aside from the pics they took while we were in the hospital thanks so much you sound like you speak from experience think that is part of my struggle too am stay at home mom and my husband is full time freelancer so much of my business is more part time and our household does rely on the income so if have to sacrifice time for my husband to take extra meetings or attend conferences it usually happens not ideal but it balancing act for sure do hate mini sessions hate the prop sessions haha short session does have to be themed was just wondering what other people thought of the themed sessions because do personally dig it that not the kind of work do either consider myself to be documentary style photographer but have also found that so many people need some direction and posing to not just feel lost and confused about what they should be doing you would be surprised how many people ca just pretend the camera is there that what had been working for with people but they have struggled to be natural my favorite sessions are family traditions and experiences baking cookies going to the pumpkin patch playing at the park but while everyone favors natural pictures have found almost no one willing to pay for them because they think they can just take them themselves that kind of how feel too haha although pull out my camera and document lot of our daily life that kind of the niche wanted to fill professional quality photos for walls but also family photo albums the way imagine it families will always prefer to look through albums and have hose tangible memories ca picture family plugging in usb drive to computer when they feel like looking through family pictures or searching through billions of cell pictures stored in very unorganized way on computer there are so many better ways to take family photos sorry that all you seem to see near you it breaks my heart see it too the photography world is just saturated with businesses and not all photographers have the right skill sets for every session or every family exactly hate hat commercial crap love the idea of the informal family session have done some in people homes before actually got to be at home with family the morning of their little girls 1st birthday and it was super sweet they knew there would be billion people and pictures at her party later in the day but they wanted way to remember how they celebrated her first year with just them no posing just natural sweetness lots of snuggles and ornery one year old do you just use your cell phone it definitely would be the same mini session is pretty fast paced and little less personal with the way many people run them that why trying to think outside the box little bit with how to approach them because fear short time line and very limited results some kids and some families just need more time to warm up and feel natural and that how it should be not like lining up for school pictures fake smiling and moving on that awesome that you recognize that that one of my pushes for some informal family sessions normal family moments and memory making is super important but if you want great pictures of it the best thing you can do is find someone else to take them for you so that your whole family is together in the images if someone behind the camera they do get to be part of it it like the same issue with being tourist you spend so much time trying to take pictures to remember your trip that you forget to enjoy your trip while it is happening have seen lot of people say the prices are just too unreasonable for their budget do you mind me asking what the prices are that you see that are unreasonable my prices are astronomical but they are not dirt cheap but include lot for people who book with me complementary albums digital copies and printing rights it important to me that people do just get pictures taken but that they have their pictures whether that photo book or prints delivered to their door we all love social media but how many of us print our own photos on the regular think they re fun but like commented somewhere else in the thread think if you do offer them you wo get clients who like them and if you do you ll develop client base that does since you dislike them do offer them and your client base probably wo develop as wanting them but they might ask you for them in which case you can always evaluate again later oh my goodness right best thing did for myself was photograph my son first haircut first birthday shopping trip first pumpkin carving first christmas cookies and tree decorating he was just so little and curious look through those images and weep over my big boy did really focus on his age so much as his milestones very true very true have been open for like year now and just feel the struggle of advertising for sessions that are out of the norm for his area people get that themed mini session thing but they struggle with family fun sessions which were my take on summer mini session playing having fun doing family activities together park water gun fight camping fishing the struggle is real as former photog can say that during the first year we marketed lot more for the every three months interval usually tied in with package from maternity newborn because kids change so fast in that time then we tried to make sure we saw people yearly afterward some folks did twice year easter amp christmas usually once clients have larger family the children become harder to capture in the whole family portrait so we do sessions where we get the kids separately and hope for group pic where everyone was looking at the camera together and smiling when you book your sessions try to ask what their end goal of the portraits will be are they looking for their holiday card do they want something to hang on the wall photo gifts that way you can tailor the session to making sure they get what they want and upsell in the specific products to go with the goal in the process do forget too that every client is different and their aesthetic may not always match up with yours if you can get feel for what they ve already had done and or liked or not liked with previous photographers you can work with those expectations rather than against them been there so feel free to pm me directly if you have any questions the photographer we use charges 150 for 30 minute session 18 pictures and 200 for 40 minute session 30 pictures her mini sessions are usually around 125 for 20 minutes and 12 pictures she is the cheapest photographer in our area so that why use her haha my husband is sales manager and teach flute lessons still young teacher but when first started having proper studio after grad school had hard time being firm about practice requirements and such because was thinking too much about how busy each family was my husband was great help to me in realizing pretty much what ve said above nobody else in these kids lives was going to advocate for flute or music nobody else knows what it takes to be really good at it or how great the rewards are for sticking it out if was meek about it soccer and social studies would always win and they never even know what they were missing out on still working on it and refining it cause it hard and communicating it well is hard too and not all my families are on board with it but ve noticed an increase in the respect they treat me with if nothing else yes some day hope to have nice camera just for personal use but for now cell phone it is hear you am very new to photography and am really struggling just to get people to let me take their photo it is really hard to walk the line between want to do this because enjoy it and want to make money doing this and then what you are willing to stretch to do to hit whichever goal you are aiming for yeah that pretty close to what it should be but even that is on the high end for my local area it stinks how variable it is good photographer should be well worth that yeah it seems to weed out the people who do value the service and you for providing it exactly your love for it makes you susceptible to being under valued and taken advantage of but if you swing to hard the other way which did then you do have enough of customer base or enough visibility to build one know by dropping prices or changing offerings will be drawing in customers that are my ideal customer but do know how else to build the visibility need to draw in my ideal customers the struggle is so very real that great advice thank you used to do freelance illustration and also ran into the issue that if you undervalue your work you miss out on some customers who would pay more and think your work must suck if you do charge enough it such hard thing to start business regardless of the medium feel uncomfortable having prices right now since struggle to find subjects but recognizing that it important to have set rate too ca plan milestones but that what our phones are for all the little things he learns and does every day but each month have different and adorable photo shoot for him with props and everything last month was all the balloons themed and the month prior was all the fruits and the month before that was all the bubbles bathtime really he got kick out of it and have fantastic and professional photos of my boy growing love it in all honesty hardly ever have professional shots taken family requested take professional photos within year of his birth and thats been about it as far as professional shots go am just not into spending cash for photos that are going to get buried do even really do photo christmas cards so kinda the exception think do have tumblr of photos that all family can access and every so often print bunch off and mail off to grandparents but that about it
